channel.title: kubernetes on YPhanama's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in kubernetes on YPhanama's Notes

item.title: kind
item.description: Playing with kind Kind is an excellent tool to have Kubernetes running locally in the machine. It uses the local machine’s Docker engine to create “nodes” within docker containers.

item.title: kubectl
item.description: This is a living document specially crafted for my personal use Go to cheatsheet About kubectl Mental model: It is the CLI tool to interact with Kubernetes API server (apiserver).
